data.html: @billglover Not online, of course. If it's online, I can just go to sleep :P It's a concert for charity, held at Melia Hotel, Jakarta. Full house, and I really feel like sleeping... with the sound of the orchestra in the background just like a CD :P
data.text:
@billglover Not online, of course. If it's online, I can just go to sleep :P
It's a concert for charity, held at Melia Hotel, Jakarta. Full house, and I really feel like sleeping... with the sound of the orchestra in the background just like a CD :P
